title: Heartcatch Precure! Movie: Hana no Miyako de Fashion Show... Desu ka!?
original_name: 映画 ハートキャッチプリキュア！花の都でファッションショー・・・ですか！？
opening_song: "Alright! Heartcatch Precure! for the Movie (Alright! ハートキャッチプリキュア! for the Movie)" by Aya Ikeda
sinopse: Sakura Kurumi, Erika's mother, is preparing for a fashion show in Paris. The girls of the school's fashion club are going to model there, including some high school students. While in Paris, they meet a mysterious boy named Oliver. However, Baron Salamander of the Desert Apostles appears, and the girls transform into Pretty Cures to defend Paris.
